BlackNightmare/Unicron::

Blacknightmare conenected the alarms and an energi field sorrounded 
him in order to avoid his scape.

Unicron's main room was circula, in midle of it was a Holograma 
where appeared Unicron's Head. 

"Report!!!" commanded Unicron"Have you destroyed Maximals?????"


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
wrote:
> Hellplague/ Malice:
>  
> Hellplague glared at Blacknightmare.  She got off of Malice and 
walked out of the room.
> "You're just jealous." she said before flying to the main 
chamber.  
> Necross and Splattercanon were already waiting. 
> 
> airly2000 <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> Unicron:
> 
> Unicron's voice sounded trought speakers "COme my minions to main 
Room, I want to heard your report"
> 
> BlackNightmare whose was behind Hellplague said sarcastically"I 
hope that Unicron doesn't get mad when he knows about your little 
pet"
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
> wrote:
> > Malice/ Hellplague/ Splattercannon/ Necross:
> >  
> > Malice was in stasis lock when Splattercannon exited the 
> atmosphere.  Thus he was spared the pain of the sub zero 
tempatures 
> of space.  The minions returned to Unicron, and after closing the 
> airlock, Splattercannon transformed, dumping Malice on the 
ground.  
> Hellplague and Splattercannon drag his battered body to a room, 
> someone's quarters, and dumped him on a bed.  His left shoulder 
was 
> nearly severed, and his joints, where a signifigant amount of semi 
> organic flesh was, were worn and thinned.  Hellplague look 
> disapprovingly at the sight and then turned to Splattercannon.
> > "I want you and Necross to re- energize him, and see if you can 
> repair him.  I must go and tend to the Sweeps."
> > Splattercannon nodded and beckoned Necross to enter.  For a 
moment 
> they both looked down at the battered and bound hunter before them.
> > "Just get a pile of energon cubes and dump them here," Necross 
> said before turning to leave.
> > Splattercannon grabbed the Minion by the shoulder before 
> addressing him.
> > "But Hellplague told us to repair him.  For whatever purpose, 
she 
> wants him alive."
> > Necross scofted before shaking his shoulder free from his 
> companion's grip.
> > "Not my problem."
> > Splattercannon fumed a moment as Necross set off for parts of 
> Unicron unknown, then proceeded to the nearest enegon storage.  He 
> gathered an armfull of cubes and brought them back to Malice's new 
> residence.  He dumped them all around the hunter and went to the 
> Repair bay to nurse his own injuries.
> > Malice finally came back online.  His vision was blurred 
somewhat, 
> but the familiar hum of energon cubes was made him more alert.  He 
> tied to sit up, but his left arm was pinned under him, so he 
settled 
> for wiggling over to the closest cube.  He touched his foot to it, 
> and began absorbing the energy from it.  His shoulder immediatly 
> began to heal itself.  He set up and tried to break his bonds, but 
> they were nearly unbreakable.  He scooted forward and touched 
> several cubes.  He quickly healed the rest of his body and scooted 
> to the edge of the bed. He was about to try and stand up when 
> Hellplague pranced in.  She walked over and pushed him back onto 
the 
> bed.  She put what looked like gravitity weights on his ankles and 
> then unbound his feet.  She repeated the same proceedure on his 
> wrists.  She then smiled and hit a button on her comm link and 
> Malice was pinned to the bed.  He tried to get up, but his arms 
and 
> legs were not going anywhere.  Hellplague smiled and straddled the
> >  hunter's mid section, leaning forward and supporting herself 
with 
> her arms resting on his chest.  
> > "Now, I think you had better just be an obediant little lizard 
and 
> stay here where I can watch you."
> > She leaned down until her face was inches from his.
> > "Or else I may have to 'disipline' you."she added with a devious 
> smirk.
> > <Tag minions>
> > 
> >
